lines.text:
[singing while urinating into a river]
Pour the devil's poison into God's cleansing river/It's of no further use to man when it's filtered through the liver!

[pointing a rifle at Wes]
You're dumb, Pennington! You're stupid! And, my God, I hate stupid people!

[indignantly]
I have a degree in economics!

[Finds a stick of dynamite in a box]
Ooh! A thunder stick!
